titles.title: National Grandparent Resource Center Act of 1993
To amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to establish the National Resource Center for Grandparents.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E506)
Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and Labor

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

bill.summary: 3/4/1993--Introduced. National Grandparent Resource Center Act of 1993 - Amends the Older Americans Act of 1965 to direct the Commissioner of the Administration on Aging to make grants or enter into contracts for the establishment of the National Resource Center for Grandparents.
